00030                                       // object in the refdata of refs without a script,
00031                                       // we can make this a pointer later.
00032             bool mHasLocals;
00033             bool mEnabled;
00034             int mCount; // 0: deleted
00035 
00036             // we are using shared pointer here to avoid having to create custom copy-constructor,
00037             // assignment operator and destructor. As a consequence though copying a RefData object
00038             // manually will probably give unexcepted results. This is not a problem since RefData
00039             // are never copied outside of container operations.
00040             boost::shared_ptr<MWMechanics::CreatureStats> mCreatureStats;
